participant_id.Description: Unique BIDS identifier for the participant in this study.

socialdev_capq_pcr_2.Description: What is your relationship to your primary caregiver? | 1, Biological or adoptive mother | 2, Biological or adoptive father | 3, Stepmother/parent's live-in girlfriend | 4, Stepfather/parent's live-in boyfriend | 5, Grandmother | 6, Grandfather | 7, Sibling | 8, Aunt | 9, Uncle | 10, Cousin | 11, Family friend | 12, Someone from foster care | 13, Other [describe]

socialdev_capq_pcg.Description: Mark which gender this person is. | 0  Female | 1  Male | 2  Other

socialdev_capq_sc.Description: Is there another adult who also helps take care of you?

socialdev_capq_scr_2.Description: What is your relationship to your secondary caregiver? | 1, Biological or adoptive mother | 2, Biological or adoptive father | 3, Stepmother/parent's live-in girlfriend | 4, Stepfather/parent's live-in boyfriend | 5, Grandmother | 6, Grandfather | 7, Sibling | 8, Aunt | 9, Uncle | 10, Cousin | 11, Family friend | 12, Someone from foster care | 13, Other [describe]

socialdev_capq_scg.Description: Mark which gender this person is. | 0  Female | 1  Male | 2  Other

socialdev_capq_01.Description: You have a friendly talk with your mom. | 0 = Never;1 = Almost never; 2=Sometimes; 3=  Often; 4=  Always

socialdev_capq_01a.Description: How about your dad? | 0 = Never;1 = Almost never; 2=Sometimes; 3=  Often; 4=  Always

socialdev_capq_02.Description: Your parents tell you that you are doing a good job. | 0 = Never;1 = Almost never; 2=Sometimes; 3=  Often; 4=  Always

socialdev_capq_03.Description: Your parents threaten to punish you and then do not do it. | 0 = Never;1 = Almost never; 2=Sometimes; 3=  Often; 4=  Always

socialdev_capq_04.Description: Your mom helps with some of your special activities (such as sports  boy/girl scouts  church youth groups). | 0 = Never;1 = Almost never; 2=Sometimes; 3=  Often; 4=  Always

socialdev_capq_04a.Description: How about your dad? | 0 = Never;1 = Almost never; 2=Sometimes; 3=  Often; 4=  Always

socialdev_capq_05.Description: Your parents reward or give something extra to you for behaving well. | 0 = Never;1 = Almost never; 2=Sometimes; 3=  Often; 4=  Always

socialdev_capq_06.Description: You fail to leave a note or let your parents know where you are going. | 0 = Never;1 = Almost never; 2=Sometimes; 3=  Often; 4=  Always

socialdev_capq_07.Description: You play games or do other fun things with your mom. | 0 = Never;1 = Almost never; 2=Sometimes; 3=  Often; 4=  Always

socialdev_capq_07a.Description: How about your dad? | 0 = Never;1 = Almost never; 2=Sometimes; 3=  Often; 4=  Always

socialdev_capq_08.Description: You talk your parents out of punishing you after you have done something wrong. | 0 = Never;1 = Almost never; 2=Sometimes; 3=  Often; 4=  Always

socialdev_capq_09.Description: Your mom asks you about your day in school. | 0 = Never;1 = Almost never; 2=Sometimes; 3=  Often; 4=  Always

socialdev_capq_09a.Description: How about your dad? | 0 = Never;1 = Almost never; 2=Sometimes; 3=  Often; 4=  Always

socialdev_capq_10.Description: You stay out in the evening past the time you are supposed to be home. | 0 = Never;1 = Almost never; 2=Sometimes; 3=  Often; 4=  Always

socialdev_capq_11.Description: Your mom helps you with your homework. | 0 = Never;1 = Almost never; 2=Sometimes; 3=  Often; 4=  Always

socialdev_capq_11a.Description: How about your dad? | 0 = Never;1 = Almost never; 2=Sometimes; 3=  Often; 4=  Always

socialdev_capq_12.Description: Your parents give up trying to get you to obey them because it's too much trouble. | 0 = Never;1 = Almost never; 2=Sometimes; 3=  Often; 4=  Always

socialdev_capq_13.Description: Your parents compliment you when you have done something well. | 0 = Never;1 = Almost never; 2=Sometimes; 3=  Often; 4=  Always

socialdev_capq_14.Description: Your mom asks you what your plans are for the coming day. | 0 = Never;1 = Almost never; 2=Sometimes; 3=  Often; 4=  Always

socialdev_capq_14a.Description: How about your dad? | 0 = Never;1 = Almost never; 2=Sometimes; 3=  Often; 4=  Always

socialdev_capq_15.Description: Your mom drives you to a special activity. | 0 = Never;1 = Almost never; 2=Sometimes; 3=  Often; 4=  Always

socialdev_capq_15a.Description: How about your dad? | 0 = Never;1 = Almost never; 2=Sometimes; 3=  Often; 4=  Always

socialdev_capq_16.Description: Your parents praise you for behaving well. | 0 = Never;1 = Almost never; 2=Sometimes; 3=  Often; 4=  Always

socialdev_capq_17.Description: Your parents do not know the friends you are with. | 0 = Never;1 = Almost never; 2=Sometimes; 3=  Often; 4=  Always

socialdev_capq_18.Description: Your parents hug or kiss you when you have done something very well. | 0 = Never;1 = Almost never; 2=Sometimes; 3=  Often; 4=  Always

socialdev_capq_19.Description: You go out without a set time to be home. | 0 = Never;1 = Almost never; 2=Sometimes; 3=  Often; 4=  Always

socialdev_capq_20.Description: Your mom talks to you about your friends. | 0 = Never;1 = Almost never; 2=Sometimes; 3=  Often; 4=  Always

socialdev_capq_20a.Description: How about your dad? | 0 = Never;1 = Almost never; 2=Sometimes; 3=  Often; 4=  Always

socialdev_capq_21.Description: You go out after dark without an adult with you. | 0 = Never;1 = Almost never; 2=Sometimes; 3=  Often; 4=  Always

socialdev_capq_22.Description: Your parents let you out of a punishment early (like lift restrictions earlier than they originally said). | 0 = Never;1 = Almost never; 2=Sometimes; 3=  Often; 4=  Always

socialdev_capq_23.Description: You help plan family activities. | 0 = Never;1 = Almost never; 2=Sometimes; 3=  Often; 4=  Always

socialdev_capq_24.Description: Your parents get so busy that they forget where you are and what you are doing. | 0 = Never;1 = Almost never; 2=Sometimes; 3=  Often; 4=  Always

socialdev_capq_25.Description: Your parents do not punish you when you have done something wrong. | 0 = Never;1 = Almost never; 2=Sometimes; 3=  Often; 4=  Always

socialdev_capq_26.Description: Your mom goes to a meeting at school  like a PTA meeting or parent/teacher conference. | 0 = Never;1 = Almost never; 2=Sometimes; 3=  Often; 4=  Always

socialdev_capq_26a.Description: How about your dad? | 0 = Never;1 = Almost never; 2=Sometimes; 3=  Often; 4=  Always

socialdev_capq_27.Description: Your parents tell you that they like it when you help out around the house. | 0 = Never;1 = Almost never; 2=Sometimes; 3=  Often; 4=  Always

socialdev_capq_28.Description: You stay out later than you are supposed to and your parents don't know it. | 0 = Never;1 = Almost never; 2=Sometimes; 3=  Often; 4=  Always

socialdev_capq_29.Description: Your parents leave the house and don't tell you where they are going. | 0 = Never;1 = Almost never; 2=Sometimes; 3=  Often; 4=  Always

socialdev_capq_30.Description: You come home from school more than an hour past the time your parents expect you to be home. | 0 = Never;1 = Almost never; 2=Sometimes; 3=  Often; 4=  Always

socialdev_capq_31.Description: The punishment your parents give depends on their mood. | 0 = Never;1 = Almost never; 2=Sometimes; 3=  Often; 4=  Always

socialdev_capq_32.Description: You are at home without an adult being with you. | 0 = Never;1 = Almost never; 2=Sometimes; 3=  Often; 4=  Always

socialdev_capq_33.Description: Your parents spank you with their hand when you have done something wrong. | 0 = Never;1 = Almost never; 2=Sometimes; 3=  Often; 4=  Always

socialdev_capq_34.Description: Your parents ignore you when you are misbehaving. | 0 = Never;1 = Almost never; 2=Sometimes; 3=  Often; 4=  Always

socialdev_capq_35.Description: Your parents slap you when you have done something wrong. | 0 = Never;1 = Almost never; 2=Sometimes; 3=  Often; 4=  Always

socialdev_capq_36.Description: Your parents take away a privilege or money from you as a punishment. | 0 = Never;1 = Almost never; 2=Sometimes; 3=  Often; 4=  Always

socialdev_capq_37.Description: Your parents send you to your room as a punishment. | 0 = Never;1 = Almost never; 2=Sometimes; 3=  Often; 4=  Always

socialdev_capq_38.Description: Your parents hit you with a belt  switch  or other object when you have done something wrong. | 0 = Never;1 = Almost never; 2=Sometimes; 3=  Often; 4=  Always

socialdev_capq_39.Description: Your parents yell or scream at you when you have done something wrong. | 0 = Never;1 = Almost never; 2=Sometimes; 3=  Often; 4=  Always

socialdev_capq_40.Description: Your parents calmly explain to you why your behavior was wrong when you misbehave. | 0 = Never;1 = Almost never; 2=Sometimes; 3=  Often; 4=  Always

socialdev_capq_41.Description: Your parents use time out (make you sit or stand in a corner) as a punishment. | 0 = Never;1 = Almost never; 2=Sometimes; 3=  Often; 4=  Always

socialdev_capq_42.Description: Your parents give you extra chores as a punishment. | 0 = Never;1 = Almost never; 2=Sometimes; 3=  Often; 4=  Always
